WorkItem.Summary: Automapper not mapping child collection within entities.

Comments.Message:
.ForMember(dest => dest.YourDestinationList, opt => opt.MapFrom<IList<SessionLog>>(src => src.UserSessionLogs)) 

if you are mapping the SessionLog to something else you will need to do another Mapper.CreateMap<SessionLog,NewSessionLogObject>()
I do this to copy hierarchical SOAP objects to EF objects where the SOAP object is in the following pattern

A has a collection of B has a collection of C etc etc.
